title: 25% of the total premium shall be paid to the Government and remaining 75% amount shall be paid to the said Authority
clause_text: 25% of the total premium shall be paid to the Government and remaining 75% amount shall be paid to the said Authority. In Regional Plan area, such amount shall be entirely paid to the Government through the concerned branch office of the Town Planning and Valuation Department.
section: Additional FSI to Biotechnology Units / Park

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
